leads.lead_text: Bladder-appendages decidedly smaller than bracteoles or absent, never fused to each other
Bladder-appendages almost as large as bracteoles or larger, often fused to each other below bracteoles
Leaves to 3 mm wide; bracteoles 3–8 mm long and wide
Leaves 4–6 mm wide; bracteoles 6–11 mm long and wide
